description: A program that reduces eyestrain produced by staring at a computer screen when working late hours
notes: .NET Framework version 4.5.2 or higher is required to run this program. If the program doesn't change the gamma under 6600K, run the file Manual_Gamma_Registry_Fix.reg in the program's directory (scoop/apps/lightbulb/current). Use the shortcut or the file LightBulb_Portable.bat in the program's directory to use start LightBulb.
